rows.label: tlk43400441_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I see...
So my father, he...

rows.label: tlk43400441_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Now that I'm married to an Invidian,
I don't get back to Torigo often.

rows.label: tlk43400441_02_msg0003
rows.name:
But, I think I'll go and have a look
at the old house sooner or later.

rows.label: tlk43400441_02_msg0004
rows.name:
He must have entrusted those golden
bracers to you because he knew he
hadn't long left.
